item.title: Maven Usage
item.description: The design of Maven can be summarized as: A lifecycle is an order list of phases A phase can be invoked on the CLI by mvn <phase>, which will execute all previous phases in the same lifecycle before executing that specified phase. Maven plugins provide goals, and goals can be bound to a phase. To use a plugin, put <plugin> in project>build>plugins. (not project>build>pluginManagement>plugins!) Executing a phase is to execute all goals bound to that phase
